action_item: Requirements - Use test clients for screen sharing during the meeting.
notes: Minor to use a test client when demonstrating NextGen.

action_item: Workflow - Show the process of receiving and processing referrals.
notes: Demonstrate the step-by-step process for entering a new referral into the system.

action_item: Requirements - Identify and document any discrepancies or needs in the demographic information system.
notes: Capture any additional fields required for better data tracking.

action_item: Interface - Explore the possibility of adding a field for program identification in the demographic section.
notes: To help identify clients' programs (e.g., drug court, MAT) upon entry.

action_item: Reports - Ensure that the system can disaggregate data based on the program clients are in.
notes: This is important for reporting purposes.

action_item: Requirements - Confirm the referral process and how referrals are received.
notes: Clarify how referrals are communicated and processed.

action_item: Data Migration - Discuss the need for digitizing the TAP process for referrals.
notes: Transition from paper to electronic records for better tracking.

action_item: Data Migration - Review the current process for sending TAP information back to the court.
notes: Ensure that the process is efficient and documented.
